name: RODRIGUEZ CIGAR LOUNGE DOMINO TOURNAMENT
short_description: $15 ADMISSION / PLAYER INCLUDES ONE DRINK + ONE CIGAR
long_description:
Tournament  Prizes

First Place Team Total | One Night Stay At Gates Hotel South Beach • 2 Miami Heat  Tickets Team Members Will Receive Full Service Haircut Including Facial Scrub Package and Hot Towel Shave from Imjuscuttin Barber Studio • 5 Pack Of Cigars

 

Second Place Team Total | Full Day Boat Rental from Paradise Boat Rental • Team Members Will Receive Full Service Haircut Package Including Hot Towel Shave and Facial Scrub from Imjuscuttin Barber Studio • 5 Pack of Cigars

 

Third Place Team Total | Team Members Will Receive Full Service Haircut Package Including Hot Towel Shave and Facial Scrub From Imjuscuttin Barber Studio • 2 Bottles Of Pilar Rum • 5 Pack of Cigars • Gates Beach Towels
